include(Reprojucer)

  message(FATAL_ERROR "JuceDemoPlugin_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(JuceDemoPlugin_jucer_FILE
  "${JuceDemoPlugin_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  PROJECT_ID "0nRd9LLGO"
)
